name: content_releases
schema: CREATE TABLE `content_releases` (`content_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_latest` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `release_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `release_notes` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `srg_version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `stig_version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
